name: Recipe: Fish and Chips
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fish and Chips.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Fish and Chips
customize.desc: A deep-fried appetizer. Coat fish fillets with batter and deep-fry until golden and crispy, then add a few chips on the side. This combination is so miraculous that whatever sauce you choose, it will always bring a hearty smile to your face.

value.text: Purchase from Louis in Court of Fontaine
